short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows navigation between posts on DTF.ru

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to use the keyboard to scroll through the feed on dtf.ru.

Use 's' key to scroll to next post.
Use 'w' key to scroll to previous post.
Use 'f' to like/unlike current post.
Press 'r' to bookmark post.
Press 'e' to open post in new tab.
